agenda.title: Introduction of attendees
discussion: Introduce and get to know each other’s background and skills

agenda.title: Assigning of roles
discussion: Assign roles based on coding experience
conclusion: Each member should participate in programming, not just documentation.

agenda.title: Review project background
discussion: Target audience and types of users: coffee enthusiasts, casual coffee drinkers, travellers, coffee shop vendors/merchants.
Discuss examples of main features that we might want to include.
conclusion: Conduct market research first then propose and finalise features in the following week.

action items.name: Conduct market research and upload to google drive

agenda.title: Discuss software tools and methodology
discussion: Discuss possible software tools and stacks to use – OS, programming languages for frontend & backend, database and cloud.
conclusion: Scrum methodology is used, because most teammates have experience with it.

action items.name: Perform research and further discussion in telegram group

agenda.title: Review market research
discussion: Discuss the pros and cons of the different services.
How can our applications stand out when there are so many existing services.

agenda.title: Discuss features
discussion: Target audience & types of users: coffee enthusiast, casual coffee drinker, travelers, coffee shops/café vendors.
Identify most common features that all the existing services have.
Brainstorm ideas, think about if we are the users, what would we want to have.

action items.name: Add and edit features on Google Drive
Send to Mr. Ee for approval

agenda.title: Discuss software tools and methodology
discussion: Review of the tentative programming tools we selected (React Native, NodeJs + ExpressJs, MongoDB, Google Cloud, Scrum).
Share ways to learn (YouTube Videos, Udemy tutorials, example projects) with each other.
Share experience on using Taiga with those who have no experience.
conclusion: Everyone need to learn, because everyone needs to contribute to the programming.

agenda.title: Discuss risk register
discussion: Discuss potential risks that might arise during the project.
Discuss the impact and probability of happening.
Discuss possible ways to mitigate such risks.
conclusion: Each member should try their best to avoid these risks.
